verbs.description: The Charlevoix G7 Summit Communiqué that President Trump [V: is] now refusing to endorse reads like a United Nations document -- or maybe the Democrat playbook -- with phrases such as " sustainable development , " " gender equality and women 's empowerment , " " fair " and " progressive " tax systems , a " level playing field , " affordable healthcare , " a " healthy planet , " and " quality work
